Address.value: 1201 SOUTH SECOND STREET, MILWAUKEE, Wisconsin, 53204, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Rockwell Automation is a pure-play automation competitor that is the successor entity to Rockwell International, which spun off its former Rockwell Collins avionics segment in 2001. As of fiscal 2021, the firm operates through three segments--intelligent devices, software and control, and lifecycle services. Intelligent devices contains its drives, sensors, and industrial components, software and control contains its information and network and security software, while lifecycle services contains its consulting and maintenance services as well as its Sensia JV with Schlumberger.

value.name: Cyril Perducat
value.title: Chief Technology Officer & Senior Vice President
